# friday-2-design

_website design project_

<br>

## üåü About

This project is for educational porpuses only. Pull request are welcome, but priority for project authors! Thank you for your cooperation!

Site published at: https://ignejurkute.github.io/friday-2-design/

Design: [friday-2-design](https://balticinstitute.sharepoint.com/sites/PHP2023.03.06ONLINE/_layouts/15/embed.aspx?uniqueId=fc92a52f-e728-4ae3-8bda-a880eb0f086c&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..SDNCRTRPdk5CZ3hxMkhWdUNGRVNjanVCNTZGMUhlb1lYRjhpNC9yK29JYz0&embed=%7B%22ha%22%3A%22teams%22%2C%22hv%22%3A%22assignments%22%2C%22hm%22%3A%22view%22%2C%22hp%22%3A%22electron%22%7D)

## üß∞ Getting Started

### üíª Prerequisites

Node.js - _download and install_

```
https://nodejs.org
```

Git - _download and install_

```
https://git-scm.com
```

### üèÉ Run locally

Would like to run this project locally? Open terminal and follow these steps:

1. Clone the repo
    ```sh
    git clone https://github.com/igneJurkute/friday-2-design.git
    ```
2. Install NPM packages
    ```sh
    npm i
    ```
    or
    ```sh
    npm install
    ```
3. Run the server
    ```sh
    npm run dev
    ```

### üß™ Running tests

There is no tests for this project.
